alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 2:35PM MST until November 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, and South Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on north to south oriented area roadways, including Interstate 25 and Tramway Boulevard.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; South Central Highlands
